amendment.description: To make available amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Army, up to $15,000,000 for upgrades of M1A1 Abrams tank transmissions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1309 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1309 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S9566-9569; text: CR S9567) To make available amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Army, up to $15,000,000 for upgrades of M1A1 Abrams tank transmissions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1309 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1309 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Bayh.
